subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic defeated defending champion Rafael Nadal 6-2, 6-4, 6-7 (3), 6-1 to capture the men’s U.S. Open title, further establishing Djokovic as the No. 1 player in the world.
snippet: Novak Djokovic defeated defending champion Rafael Nadal 6-2, 6-4, 6-7 (3), 6-1 to capture the men’s U.S. Open title, further establishing Djokovic as the No. 1 player in the world.
